FuncDef:
The traffic-statistics enable command enables the function to collect SR LSP (that is, SR-MPLS BE tunnel) traffic statistics.
The undo traffic-statistics enable command disables the function to collect SR LSP traffic statistics.
By default, the function to collect SR LSP traffic statistics is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies SR LSPs that are established based on an IP prefix list.
The name is a string of 1 to 169 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies SR LSPs that are established based on host routes with 32-bit masks.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect SR LSP traffic statistics for traffic monitoring or charging, run the traffic-statistics enable command to enable the function to collect such statistics.
After you enable the function, collected SR LSP traffic statistics can be queried using the display segment-routing traffic-statistics command.
The statistics can be cleared using the reset segment-routing traffic-statistics command.
